properties.name: eventType
properties.description: The name of the event.

properties.name: target
properties.description: The target of the event.

properties.name: currentTarget
properties.description: The current propagation target of the event.

properties.name: eventPhase
properties.description: The current propagation phase of the event.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.description: If true, the event supports the bubbling phase of propagation.

properties.name: cancelable
properties.description: If true, the default behavior of the event on its target can be canceled.

properties.name: timeStamp
properties.description: The time the event was initialized.

properties.name: propagationStopped
properties.description: If true, propagation of the event beyond the current target has been stopped.

properties.name: defaultPrevented
properties.description: If true, the default behavior of the event on its target has been canceled.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique ID of the Event.

properties.name: isValid
properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

properties.name: index
properties.description: The index of the Event within its containing object.

properties.name: properties
properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

methods.name: stopPropagation
methods.description: Stops propagation of the event beyond the current target.

methods.name: preventDefault
methods.description: Cancels the default behavior of the event on its target.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Event.

methods.name: getElements
methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

properties.description: Dispatched before a Event is placed. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_PLACE

properties.description: Dispatched after a Event is placed. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_PLACE

properties.description: Dispatched after one or more links in the Event have been added, deleted, or modified. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_LINKS_CHANGED

properties.description: Dispatched after a Event is created. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_NEW

properties.description: Dispatched before a Event is deleted. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_DELETE

properties.description: Dispatched after a Event is deleted. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_DELETE

properties.description: Dispatched before a Event is updated. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_UPDATE

properties.description: Dispatched after a Event is updated. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_UPDATE

properties.description: Dispatched before a Event is embedded. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_EMBED

properties.description: Dispatched after a Event is embedded. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_EMBED

properties.description: Dispatched before a Event is unembedded. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_UNEMBED

properties.description: Dispatched after a Event is unembedded. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_UNEMBED

properties.description: Dispatched before a Event is relocated from one object to another. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_MOVE

properties.description: Dispatched after a Event is relocated from one object to another. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_MOVE

properties.description: Dispatched when the Event is invoked. This event does not bubble. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: ON_INVOKE

properties.description: Dispatched before the Event is invoked. This event does not bubble. This event is cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_INVOKE

properties.description: Dispatched after the Event is invoked. This event does not bubble. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_INVOKE

properties.description: Dispatched before the Event is displayed. This event does not bubble. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_DISPLAY

properties.description: Dispatched before the Event is quit. Allows the quit to be canceled. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_QUIT

properties.description: Dispatched when the Event is quitting. Since the quit has been committed, it can not be canceled. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_QUIT

properties.description: Dispatched after the active context changes. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_CONTEXT_CHANGED

properties.description: Dispatched after the active selection changes. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_SELECTION_CHANGED

properties.description: Dispatched after an attribute on the active selection changes. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_SELECTION_ATTRIBUTE_CHANGED

properties.description: Dispatched before the Event becomes inactive. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_DEACTIVATE

properties.description: Dispatched after the Event becomes active. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_ACTIVATE

properties.description: Dispatched after a Event is opened. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_OPEN

properties.description: Dispatched before a Event is closed. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_CLOSE

properties.description: Dispatched when a Event is closing. Since the close has been committed, it can no longer be canceled. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_CLOSE
